name: "Sackophobia!"

description: Through an interdimensional portal, Widow ends up in Area 51, where another woman, named Brandi DeMille, has become an unwilling subject in an experiment to create an alien-human hybrid.
While the Widow is being detained at Area 51, forced outside the highly secret military basis are plotting Widow and Brandi DeMille's escape.
As Brandi DeMille undergoes a physical transformation, she and the Widow make telepathic contact. Upon awakening from her slumber, the Widow is ready to fight.

Mother Sarah has never stopped searching for her missing children. Her quest takes Sarah and her companion Tsue to a mining town controlled by a child dictator bent on using his youthful army to rid the world of everyone over 40 years of age! But Sarah uncovers the real power behind this planned geriatricide: a cruelly beautiful woman who is the apparent mistress of Boy's Town.

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description: The sinister Mother of the City of the Children is throwing a party for her charges, a great feast lubricated with forbidden liquor and illegal aphrodisiacs. But the main event -- the thing that will make the night -- is Sarah herself, as she's pitted against a bevy of drug-crazed giant men.

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description: Mother Sarah once led a comfortable life with her family in the colonies orbiting high above the ruined planet earth. But nothing lasts forever. An ugly civil war has torn her family asunder, leaving her an earthbound sex-slave to her colony's political enemies, the Epoch movement. If she is to survive, escape, and find her missing children, she must never give up hope.

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description: Sarah's prospects for finding her family have never looked dimmer than they do today. Enslaved by the City of the Children, she and the other adults are at hard labor for their youthful captors, excavating leaky canisters of deadly radioactive waste from an icebound mine. The teen-aged overseers' maltreatment of another prisoner forces her to make an impossible choice: she can turn a blind eye or she can put her own life -- and her quest -- on the line by tangling with the mysterious Mother of the City of the Children.

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description: The Mother holds the real power in the of the City of the Children, and she would like nothing better than to see Sarah dead. But discontent is brewing amongst certain factions of Mother's soldiers, and that discontent could be the key to Sarah's escape from the City of Children!

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description: On her journey to discover her lost children, Sarah came to this city -- a city populated almost entirely by youth. She had hoped to find her own children here, to piece back together the life she had before the evacuation of the space colonies. But now, cornered by two drug-crazed rapists, she wonders if her cause is hopeless. If she'll even make it out of this city alive. If she'll ever see her children again. This is one woman's pilgrimage through the apocalypse, a pilgrimage of unending disappointment and never-ending hope; this is The Legend of Mother Sarah.

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description: First Sarah thought the city was run by the children. Then she thought it was under the thumb of an egocentric woman named Mother. But now she has met Zaar, and she knows exactly who holds the reins to the city . . . and who will hold her own reins if she cannot escape.

volume.name: The Legend of Mother Sarah: City of the Children

description:
This issue introduces us to the story of Rostam and his son Sohrab, arguably the most famous of all Shahnameh stories. Rostam, looking for his lost horse, enters the courts of the King of Samangan where he meets Princess Tahmineh. The story becomes an epic romance, a tale of separation, passion, valour, and betrayal, and ends with Rostam facing an opponent whose strength equals his Sohrab, his own son!

This issue was released to coincide with the birthday of the original author of the Shahnameh, the Persian poet known as Ferdowsi, or Firdausi (Hakm Abul-Qsim Ferdows Ts)
name: Rostam and Sohrab

description: This issue is a prequel to the Rostam and Sohrab tragedy. It tells of King Kai-Kavous' romance with Princess Soodabeh in the mountain kingdom of Hamavaran, and subsequently gets himself captured and thrown into a dungeon. Rostam must step in and defeat his countrys enemies, saving a king who questions his loyalties and guarding the throne from a nefarious usurper.
name: Return of the King

description: Together, they can defeat even the most powerful super villain -- but can the Avengers govern the world? They are Earth's Mightiest Heroes, united in their vow to protect the planet from those enemies against whom no single super hero can stand alone...and this may be their greatest challenge. The capital cities of every country on Earth have mysteriously vanished, throwing the globe into anarchy. In this time of extraordinary crisis, the nations of the world turn to the only organization capable of leading them through the ensuing strife and restoring political, economic and social order: the Avengers. Collecting AVENGERS (1998) #57-61.
name: Avengers: World Trust

description: Issue #2 continues the incredible opening blast from Dynamite and Kevin Smith: the original Green Hornet struggles with forces put in motion against him while his son unwittingly becomes a pawn in a world not of his making
name: Episode Two: Happily Ever After

description: Galactus! He's devoured worlds since the dawn of the Universe. Consuming the Korbinites' home was nothing special. But for Beta Ray Bill - oathbrother to Thor and the Korbinites' defender - it was a failure of his life's duty... and has given him a certain clarity. How can a hero suffer such a threat to exist? Beta Ray Bill sets forth to hunt down Galactus, force him to his knees and make him pay - with a plan so audacious even the Planet Eater will feel fear. Collecting BETA RAY BILL: GODHUNTER #1-3 and SECRET INVASION AFTERMATH: BETA RAY BILL - THE GREEN OF EDEN.
name: TPB

description: As CIVIL WAR rages throughout the Marvel Universe, an unlikely group of heroes have gathered together to hunt down and capture criminals who refuse to sign the Registration Act. In response to the overwhelming number of masked fugitives on the loose, Misty Knight and Colleen Wing use their bail-bonds skills, underworld connections and government funding to lead an all-new Heroes for Hire into battle. Action, adventure, crime, beautiful women and Kung Fu chaos come together in this explosive new saga featuring Black Cat; Shang-Chi, Master of Kung Fu; Paladin; Misty Knight; Colleen Wing; and the all-new Tarantula. Collecting HEROES FOR HIRE #1-5.
name: TPB

description: As the public turns against Marvel's heroes, the gears of CIVIL WAR threaten to crush Brian K. Vaughan's Runaways. But when Allan Heinberg's Young Avengers offer their assistance, how can the Runaways believe they're on the same side? Don't miss this CIVIL WAR tie-in that promises to have lasting repercussions for both popular teams! Collecting CIVIL WAR: YOUNG AVENGERS & RUNAWAYS #1-4, plus extras.
name: TPB

volume.name: Civil War: Young Avengers and Runaways

name: Ritorno a Scuola: Ce la Far? S!
